## ThreeDOFControlsProps interface

Properties that can be passed to the [ThreeDOFControls](./controls.threedofcontrols.md) constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ThreeDOFControlsProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dampingFactor?](./controls.threedofcontrolsprops.dampingfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Damping factor between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.7 |
|  [domElement?](./controls.threedofcontrolsprops.domelement.md) | HTMLElement | <i>(Optional)</i> DOM element that should listen for pointer events. Defaults to <code>document.body</code> |
|  [panFactor?](./controls.threedofcontrolsprops.panfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Mutiplier for panning. Defaults to Math.PI / 20 |
|  [pedestalFactor?](./controls.threedofcontrolsprops.pedestalfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Mutiplier for pedestal translation. Defaults to 1 |
|  [tiltFactor?](./controls.threedofcontrolsprops.tiltfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Mutiplier for tilting. Defaults to Math.PI / 20 |
|  [truckFactor?](./controls.threedofcontrolsprops.truckfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Mutiplier for truck translation. Defaults to 1 |
